name: Sonic Jump! (AmbitiousIndie)
description:
Sonic Jump!

A very simple PLATFORMER game made for Sonic fans!
He's real speed!
5 Levels to play with! (4 levels still in development and are not complete but stay tuned for more harder levels to make the game challenging).
Control Sonic and collect the coins to advance to the next level!

Notice: THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND THERE IS ONLY ONE LEVEL AT THE MOMENT, SO AFTER FINISHING IT THERE IS NOTHING TO DO BASICALLY. POST YOUR COMMENTS WITH POSITIVES AND NEGATIVES ABOUT THE GAME AND HELP ME MAKE THE GAME BETTER! THE LEVELS ARE TESTED, SO IT IS POSSIBLE TO FINISH IT.
PS. This is the first game I've ever made! This is my submission for the beginner friendly Game Jam!
`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
Made Using Phaser 3.
